author: OKFN
name: columbia-mapa-de-cooperacion-internacional
notes:
Database of development projects in Columbia
## Details
The Presidential Agency for Social Action and International Cooperation is the organization created by the National Government with the purpose of coordinating national and international resources to execute all the social programs required by the Presidency of the Republic to take care of vulnerable populations affected by the poverty, the drug trafficing and the violence.

extras.value: All of website in Spanish, but quite intuitive none the less. Use "Panorama" to look at data visually on a map. Use "Detalle" to look at specific projects. Use "Informacion en tablas" to filter by sector, country and region in table view. All of the above give you export options. Requires Adobe Flash version 8 or better.
Yes (in theory, but received error messages whenever this was attempted)
Bogotá D.C. Edificio Principal Calle 7 No. 6-54 - PBX (57 1) 596 0800 /01/02 - Fax 284 4120

Sectors as listed above are translated from the Spanish- it may be that meaning of a sector has been changed through translation.
